name: InfluxDB
description: InfluxData collects information about the usage of InfluxDB. This “phone home” capability is intended to provide us with information about the broader user community and an understanding of how the platform is being used.

noop.name: Disable usage data reporting
noop.description: Telemetry reporting is enabled by default. However, we’ve made it as easy as possible to ‘opt-out’ of the reporting. Simply start the InfluxDB process with the --reporting-disabled flag
